title: What are the best future applications developed using RFID technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: A Book Library that is totally based on the RFID system While on YouTube, I came across a video which makes use of these RFID technology I think this is best application of RFID in India I've seen so far  What it does? Helps in borrowing the books independently with the help of ID cards. A message is sent to your registered phone number.This helps find a particular book from the shelves. Raises an alarm, if a person tries to steal it from the library. There is no way to escape taking the book.It's easy to return the books, just scan your ID card and deposit your books. Link to the video : RFID usage in Indian Libraries - 2CQR India Thanks for reading
